title: How do I synchronize contacts and calendar events?
answer:
To synchronize contacts, you must log in to at least one Exchange account. 

 On the Account setup screen, touch Exchange. Get the email server's settings from your email service provider's website, configure the settings on your phone, and log in to your Exchange account. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111400) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111401) 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111402) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111403)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111404)| 

 Go to Settings and select the account that you want to synchronize. Set the synchronization cycle to Automatic (push).Clicking![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111405)> Sync nowï¼ŒThe content you check will automatically synchronized from the server to the phone 

 If the contacts synchronization fails, check that your phone has Internet access and that the email server supports contacts synchronization. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111406)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111407)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111408)
